title: Replace About headshot, add crown to ProSellers logo, increase footer font sizes

requirements.summary: Replace the existing headshot image in AboutSection with the newly generated asset mayur-sahu-headshot-new.dim_400x500.png while preserving all layout, animations, and credential content
acceptanceCriteria: The About / Meet The Founder section displays the new photo of Mayur Sahu (navy blue blazer, white shirt, framed artwork background) instead of the old headshot.
The image renders correctly in both desktop two-column layout and mobile stacked layout.
Gold corner accents and scroll-triggered slide-in animations are unaffected.

file_operations.description: Update the image source in the headshot image element to reference frontend/public/assets/generated/mayur-sahu-headshot-new.dim_400x500.png instead of the current headshot path. Ensure the image alt text remains descriptive and that all existing gold corner accent overlays, scroll-triggered slide-in animations, and the credential list with CheckCircle icons remain unchanged.
